Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Jug
Description: Globular jug, with projecting rim, short neck and unstable base. Orangey coloured paste. There are remnants of coating on the exterior surface and it bears a painted decoration of the geometrical  type with double horizontal bands encircling the piece at the shoulder, near the top and near the bottom.There are two mamelons serving as handles.
